content:
# The move command executed successfully, indicating that I am now at the exact coordinates of the nearest stone patch.
# I will now proceed to place the stone furnace at this position.

# Placing the stone furnace to begin the smelting process.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=final_position)  # Place the furnace at the stone patch.
print(f'Furnace placed at: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace.
